requirements.summary: Remove the logo design from the Navigation component, replacing it with plain text branding or removing it entirely
acceptanceCriteria: No logo image or custom graphic is rendered in the Navigation component.
The navigation bar remains functional with Feed and Profile links intact.
No broken image references or missing asset errors appear in the console.

file_operations.description: Remove any logo image or custom graphic rendering (Om symbol or other logo assets). Replace with plain text branding or remove the logo section entirely while preserving the Feed and Profile navigation links. Ensure no broken image references remain.
